72:1: qul  oo-hiya  i-laiya  an-nna  hus-ta-maa  na-fa-rum  mi-nal  jin-ni   fa-qaa-looo  in-naa  sa-mi-naa  qu-raa-nan  a-ja-ba
72:2: yah-deee  i-lar  rus-hdi     faaa-man-naa  bihee  wa-lan  nus-hri-ka  bi-rab-bi-naaa  a-ha-da
72:3: waan-na-hoo  taaa-laa  jad-du  rab-bi-naa  mat  ta-kha-za   saa-hi-ba-tanw  wa-laa  wa-la-da
72:4: waan-na-hoo  kaa-na  ya-qoo-lu  safee-hu-naa  al   al-la-hi  sha-ta-ta
72:5: waan-naa  za-nan-naaa  al  lan  ta-qoo-lal  in-su    wal-jin-nu  al   al-la-hi  ka-zi-ba
72:6: waan-na-hoo  kaa-na  ri-jaa-lun  mi-nal  in-si    yaoo-zoo-na  bi-ri-jaa-lin  mi-nal  jin-ni   fa-zaa-doo-hum  ra-ha-qa
72:7: waan-na-hum  zan-noo  ka-maa  za-nan-tum  al  la-ny  ya-ba-sal  laa-hu   a-ha-da
72:8: waan-naa  la-mas-nas  sa-maaaa  fa-wa-jad-naa-haa  mu-li-at  ha-ra-san  shadee-danw  wa-shu-hu-ba
72:9: waan-naa  kun-naa  na-qu-du  mi-nhaa  ma-qaai-da  lis-sa-mi  fa-ma-ny  yas-ta-miil  aa-na   ya-jid  la-hoo  shi-haa-bar  ra-sa-da
72:10: waan-naa  laa  nad-reee  a-shar-run  uree-da  bi-man  fil  ar-di    am   a-raa-da  bi-him  rab-bu-hum  ra-sha-da
72:11: waan-naa  min-nas  saa-li-hoo-na  wa-min-naa  doo-na  zaa-li-ka  kun-naa  ta-raaai-qa  qi-da-da
72:12: waan-naa  za-nan-naaa  al  lan  nu-ji-zal  laa-ha   fil  ar-di    wa-lan  nu-ji-za-hoo  ha-ra-ba
72:13: waan-naa  lam-maa  sa-mi-nal  hu-daaa  aa-man-naa  bihee  fa-ma-ny  yu-min  bi-rab-bihee  fa-laa  ya-khaa-fu  bak-hsanw  wa-laa  ra-ha-qa
72:14: waan-naa  min-nal  mus-li-moo-na  wa-min-nal  qaa-si-too-na  fa-man  as-la-ma  fau-laaai-ka  ta-har-raw  ra-sha-da
72:16: waal-la-wis  ta-qaa-moo  a-lat  taree-qa-ti  laas-qay-naa-hum  maaan   gha-da-qa
72:17: li-naf-ti-na-hum  feeh   wa-ma-ny  yu-rid  an   zik-ri   rab-bihee  yas-lu-khu  a-zaa-ban  saa-da
72:18: waan-nal  ma-saa-ji-da  lil-laa-hi  fa-laa  ta-doo  maal   laa-hi   a-ha-da
72:19: waan-na-hoo  lam-maa  qaa-ma  ab-dul  laa-hi   ya-doo-hu  kaa-doo  ya-koo-noo-na  a-lai-hi  li-ba-da
72:20: qul  in-na-maaa  a-doo  rab-bee  wa-laaa  us-hri-ku  biheee  a-ha-da
72:21: qul  in-nee  laaa  am-li-ku  la-kum  dar-ranw  wa-laa  ra-sha-da
72:22: qul  in-nee  la-ny  yu-jee-ranee  mi-nal  laa-hi   a-ha-dunw  wa-lan  a-ji-da  min  doo-nihee  mul-ta-ha-da
72:23: il-laa  ba-laa-gham  mi-nal  laa-hi   wa-ri-saa-laa-tih  wa-ma-ny  ya-sil  laa-ha   wa-ra-soo-la-hoo  fain-na  la-hoo  naa-ra  ja-han-na-ma  khaa-li-dee-na  fee-haaa  a-ba-da
72:24: hat-taaa  i-zaa  raaw   maa  yoo-a-doo-na  fa-saya-la-moo-na  man  a-da-fu  naa-si-ranw  waa-qal-lu  a-da-da
72:25: qul  in  ad-reee  a-qa-ree-bum  maa  too-a-doo-na  am  ya-ja-lu  la-hoo  rab-beee  a-ma-da
72:26: aa-li-mul  ghai-bi    fa-laa  yu-zhi-ru  a-laa  ghai-biheee  a-ha-da
72:27: il-laa  ma-nir  ta-daa   mir  ra-soo-lin  fain-na-hoo  yas-lu-ku  min  bai-ni  ya-dai-hi  wa-min  khal-fihee  ra-sa-da
72:28: liya-la-ma  an  qad  ab-la-ghoo  ri-saa-laa-ti  rab-bi-him  waa-haa-ta  bi-maa  la-dai-him  waah-saa  kul-la  shaiin   a-da-da
